If you're up for an action-packed take on transhumanism, "Iron Man 3" is a thrilling choice featuring the genius Tony Stark played by Robert Downey Jr. Enjoy the ride!

I'd highly recommend "RoboCop" for you! It's a thrilling action movie about a police officer who is brought back to life as a cyborg, fighting crime in a dystopian Detroit. With stars like Gary Oldman and Peter Weller, it's definitely worth watching if you enjoy transhumanism themes!

Another film that might pique your interest is "Peep World." This thought-provoking drama centers around four siblings whose lives are turned upside down when a book written about them is published. Featuring an impressive cast including Rainn Wilson, Judy Greer, and Sarah Silverman, it's a must-see for fans of Shel Silverstein's writing style!
